greeters
--------

.. first two lines tell sphinx what you want autogenerated into directory "generated"
.. the consecutive lines tell the source of autogeneration
.. it autogenerates a summary page

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated
   
    skeleton.greeters.base
    skeleton.greeters.fancy

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 8

   subgreeters/index
